divs: Sighting DetailsLooked up and saw what I thought was a star. I was standing outside with some friends and just joking around i said look ufo! And then the light changed it's path slightly then got very bright and dimmed back down and eventually disappeared into the dark of night.The color and object looked like a star blueish-white. It was the first ufo sighting I have ever seen in person and it was kind of freaky seeing it.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Clio
There were no other sightings in Clio on or around July 4th 2012
Summary: Looked up thought it was a star then brightened, changed path, dimmed then disappeared.
